description.@value: This building block empowers individuals and data providers to manage consent and find suitable services and dataspace ecosystems.  This contract/consent agent matches an individual's 'consent profile' with the conditions of the ecosystem and recommends the best services based on their needs and the permissibility of the data.

functionalities.@value: This building-block will enable individuals to set their consent preferences.

Automatic matching and recommendation process will be build on top of Individuals a consent profile (e.g., all-time connection, only on weekends, specific keywords), and organizations data sharing agreement.
